text-alert-checkbox.fieldDescription: Default value: Please send me text alerts from Energy Harbor. Limit of 485 characters.
text-alert-checkbox.value: I hereby consent to receive autodialed and or pre-recorded/artificial telemarketing calls and/or text messages from or on behalf of Energy Harbor at the telephone number listed above. I agree to receive account and marketing related communications from Energy Harbor. I understand that message and data rates may apply and that this consent is not a condition of purchasing any goods or services from Energy Harbor. This consent may be revoked at any time by calling Energy Harbor.
text-alert-checkbox.name: ./textAlertCheckbox
